body:
Chien,
If you have rendered images you can use pvalue to extract pixel data.  Make
sure you use rpict -i if you what illuminance instead of luminance values.
Or you can use rtrace -I to generate illuminance data for a grid of points.
Best,
Andy




On Mon, Jul 1, 2013 at 5:33 AM, Chien Si Harriman
___
